answerText: IUPAC [or International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry][10] A major IUPAC project currently underway is finding an appropriate nomenclature for polymers composed of these substances. These substances are complexes of ligands attached to a central transition metal.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 11 | 4 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This organization publishes a Blue Book which lists every single rule for nomenclature in organic chemistry. [10] Name this organization headquartered in Zurich, which was created by a committee headed by August Kekule. This organization's Gold Book is more formally called the Compendium of Chemical Terminology.
